vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δεκ-τός, ή, όν,
to be received or accepled, acceptable, [LXX+NT]; δεκτόν [ἐστι] it is an accepted principle, with infinitive, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 to be grasped, χείρ [Refs 4th c.AD+]
__II to be taken, understood, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
acceptable, favorable
accepted, acceptable, agreeable, approved,favorable Lk. 4:24; Acts 10:35; Phil. 4:18; by impl. when used of a certain time, marked by divine acceptance, propitious, Lk. 4:19; 2Cor. 6:2*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 被收納的, 被接受的 (路 4:24)
2) 合意的, 欣然接納的 (腓 4:18)
3) 有益的, 合宜的 (路 4:19; 林後 6:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 被收纳的, 被接受的(路4:24)
2) 合意的, 欣然接纳的(腓4:18)
3) 有益的, 合宜的(路4:19; 林后6:2)
